name: Pixie Shooter MVP
description:
This is a new MVP testing out a concept for a potential game moving forward! Controls are just press F to shoot and SPACE to jump. Feedback highly appreciated! Be sure to check out my socials and website for more content!

I did the main character/boss/obstacle sprites, the moving grass sprites, the engine revving sfx, the dragon cries, the win/loss jingles, recharge meter sfx, and the bgm.

SFX: https://fallenblood.itch.io/50-sfx

Shooting Asset: https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-shooting-fx

UI: https://blackdragon1727.itch.io/platformer-ui-buttons

Ground: https://maaot.itch.io/mossy-cavern

Background: https://ansimuz.itch.io/warped-caves
